answers.answer: That's happened to me to. N they had no explanation and told me the same thing. Doctors!!!!

Sounds like elevated blood pressure or low blood glucose. Purchase a blood pressure machine and monitor it, also a glucose machine to rule out any complications such as preeclampsia. Or it could be something as simple as dehydration. Drink plenty of water and get rest!
I just had my glucose screening 4 weeks ago I'm 32 weeks. I have had elevated blood pressure
Im going in this morning. Ill let you know what it was
So I found out it had nothing to do with my blood pressure and that it was some sort of bad migraine. All is well with baby (: Thank God
Sounds like a migraine a bad one i get them ..
Oh just saw your comment i got one at 18 wks but im prone to them anyway awful they r hope your ok x

question: This wad just random my vision went blurry woth flutter for about 8 minutes. Then it stopped and I layed down and my left hand went numb and my tounge went numb. I called my doctor about the vision and she said to take it easy and if I faint then to go to the hospital. But thwy wet closed vy the time the numbness happened. Now everything feels normal minus a head ache... what going on
title: blurred vision and numbness
